Title: Isolated Above, Connected Below
Writer: Lana Wachowski (created by), Lilly Wachowski (created by), J. Michael Straczynski (created by), Lana Wachowski, J. Michael Straczynski
Actors: Doona Bae, Jamie Clayton, Tina Desai, Tuppence Middleton
Plot: While Capheus enjoys a welcome surprise, Lito makes a splash at a high-profile event. Riley works to gain the trust of a Sensate she saw at the rave.
